congrats to you all ladies!! aww girls and boys are all so much fun and they all have different personalities too. im having the Csections because my firs his HB went down to 19bpm and my blood pressure rised and so it ended in a emergency csection so i never had a natural birth like i wanted to. but hey, lol at least my babies are healthy and i get to look foward to a round head on my baby boy lol.

Congratulations to you both ladies!  It's so excitin no matter if it 2+ babies, it's a gift!! I just still feel like I found out even though I'm 30w3d today.

question: I'm due August 22nd but I will be having a Csection on August 15th sometime in the morning.  I'm having a boy and his name is going to be Joseph Isaac Smith Jr! ! This is my 5th baby and my 5th csection. I have 1 boy 3 girls and a step daughter and now we have a boy on the way. We all are so excited! ! I will be 30w3d tomorrow.what are you excited about? !!
title: I'm just Excited!
